column1: The  learned  counsel  for  the  appellant  did  not  canvass  the  sentence
imposed  on  the  appellant.  The  sentence  is  reasonable  and  lawful.
Therefore, I find no reason to interfere with the judgment, conviction,
and sentence imposed by the learned high court judge.
sentence imposed on the accused-appellant are affirmed.

column4:
J
 
 
 
 
 
UDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL

column5: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
